member.name: M:API.Controllers.ImageController.getAllImagesQuery
member.returns: A list of all images, each with fields {Id, FileData, CreatorID, CreatorUsername, Likes, Views}

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ImageController.getImageById(System.String)
member.summary: Get an image by its Id.
member.returns: An image with fields {Id, FileData, CreatorID, CreatorUsername, Likes, Views}
